00020 #define LOOP

00029 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_CLIQUE_H
00030 #define CONSTRAINT_CLIQUE_H
00031 
00032 template<typename VarArray>
00033     struct CliqueConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00034 {
00035     virtual string constraint_name()
00036         { return "Clique"; }
00037 
00038   //typedef BoolLessSumConstraint<VarArray, VarSum,1-VarToCount> NegConstraintType;
00039     typedef typename VarArray::value_type VarRef;
00040 
00041     VarArray var_array;
00042     int dom_min;
00043     int dom_max;
00044     int dom_size;
00045 
00046     vector<vector<int> > domains;
00047     vector<vector<int> > current_support;
00048     
00049 #ifdef LOOP
00050     vector<Reversible<int> > check_val1;
00051     vector<Reversible<int> > check_val2;
00052 #endif
00053     
00054 #ifdef COUNT
00055     vector<Reversible<int> > counter;
00056 #endif
00057     
00058     CliqueConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const VarArray& _var_array, TupleList* tuples) : AbstractConstraint(_stateObj),
00059         var_array(_var_array)
00060     { 
00061         CHECK(tuples->tuple_size() == 2, "Clique requires binary constraints");
00062         dom_max = var_array[0].getInitialMax();
00063         dom_min = var_array[0].getInitialMin();
00064         dom_size = dom_max - dom_min + 1;
00065         domains.resize(dom_max - dom_min + 1);
00066         
00067         current_support.resize(var_array.size());
00068         for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00069             current_support[i].resize(dom_size, 0);
00070 #ifdef LOOP      
00071         check_val1.reserve(dom_size);
00072         check_val2.reserve(dom_size);
00073         
00074         for(int i = 0; i < dom_size; ++i)
00075         {
00076           check_val1.push_back(Reversible<int>(stateObj, 0));
00077           check_val2.push_back(Reversible<int>(stateObj, 1));
00078         }
00079 #endif
00080 #ifdef COUNT
00081         counter.reserve(dom_size);
00082         for(int i = 0; i < dom_size; ++i)
00083         {
00084             counter.push_back(Reversible<int>(stateObj, 0));
00085         }
00086 #endif
00087         for(int i = 0; i < tuples->size(); ++i)
00088         {
00089             int first = (*tuples)[i][0];
00090             int second = (*tuples)[i][1];
00091             
00092             if(first >= dom_min && first <= dom_max && 
00093                second >= dom_min && second <= dom_max)
00094             {
00095                 domains[first - dom_min].push_back(second);
00096             }
00097         }
00098         
00099         for(int i = 0; i < (dom_max - dom_min + 1); ++i)
00100             sort(domains[i].begin(), domains[i].end());
00101     }
00102 
00103     int dynamic_trigger_count()
00104     { return var_array.size() * dom_size * 2; }
00105 
00106     virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint()
00107         { abort(); }
00108 
00109     void blast_value(int var, int val)
00110     {
00111         for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00112         {
00113             if(i != var)
00114                 var_array[i].removeFromDomain(val);
00115         }
00116     }
00117 #ifdef LOOP   
00118     void update_checkval(const int dom)
00119     {
00120         const int real_dom = dom + dom_min;
00121         const int size = var_array.size();
00122         int i,j;
00123         for(i = check_val1[dom]; i < size; ++i)
00124         {
00125             if(i != check_val2[dom] && var_array[i].inDomain(real_dom))
00126                 break;
00127         }
00128         
00129         for(j = check_val2[dom]; j < size; ++j)
00130         {
00131             if(j != i && var_array[j].inDomain(real_dom))
00132                 break;
00133         }
00134         
00135         if(i > j)
00136             swap(i,j);
00137         D_ASSERT((i == size && j == size) || (i < j));
00138             
00139         D_ASSERT(i == size || var_array[i].inDomain(real_dom));
00140         D_ASSERT(j == size || var_array[j].inDomain(real_dom));
00141         
00142         check_val1[dom] = i;
00143         check_val2[dom] = j;
00144     }
00145 #endif
00146     
00148     int find_new_support(int var, int dom)
00149     {
00150         const vector<int>& supporting = domains[dom];
00151         // Lost support for 'dom_value' from 'var_activated'.
00152         const int initial_pos = current_support[var][dom];
00153         int pos = initial_pos;
00154         D_ASSERT(pos >= 0 && pos <= supporting.size());
00155         while(pos < supporting.size() && !var_array[var].inDomain(supporting[pos]))
00156             ++pos;
00157         
00158         if(pos != supporting.size())
00159             return pos;
00160         
00161         pos = 0;
00162         while(pos <= initial_pos && !var_array[var].inDomain(supporting[pos]))
00163             ++pos;
00164         
00165         if(pos <= initial_pos)
00166             return pos;
00167         else
00168             return -1;
00169     }
00170     
00171     virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00172     {
00173         PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Clique);
00174         int trigger_activated = dt - dynamic_trigger_start();
00175 #ifdef COUNT
00176         if(trigger_activated >= var_array.size() * dom_size)
00177         {
00178             trigger_activated -= var_array.size() * dom_size;
00179             const int dom_value = trigger_activated % dom_size;
00180             counter[dom_value] = counter[dom_value] - 1;
00181             D_ASSERT(counter[dom_value] >= 0);
00182             return;
00183         }
00184 #endif
00185         
00186         const int var_activated = trigger_activated / dom_size;
00187         const int dom_value = trigger_activated % dom_size;
00188 
00189 #ifdef COUNT
00190         if(counter[dom_value] == 0 || (counter[dom_value] == 1 && var_array[var_activated].inDomain(dom_value + dom_min)))
00191         {
00192             return;
00193         }
00194 #endif
00195         
00196 #ifdef LOOP        
00197         if(check_val1[dom_value] == var_array.size())
00198         {
00199             PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Counter2);
00200             return;
00201         }
00202         if(check_val2[dom_value] == var_array.size() && check_val1[dom_value] == var_activated)
00203         {
00204             PROP_INFO_ADDONE(Counter3);
00205             return;
00206         }
00207      
00208         update_checkval(dom_value);
00209 #endif
00210         // Lost support for 'dom_value' from 'var_activated'.        
00211         int pos = find_new_support(var_activated, dom_value);
00212         
00213         if(pos != -1)
00214         {
00215             current_support[var_activated][dom_value] = pos;
00216             var_array[var_activated].addDynamicTrigger(dt, DomainRemoval, domains[dom_value][pos]);
00217             return;
00218         }
00219         else
00220         {
00221             PROP_INFO_ADDONE(CounterA);
00222 
00223             blast_value(var_activated, dom_value + dom_min);
00224 #ifdef LOOP
00225             check_val1[dom_value] = var_activated;
00226             check_val2[dom_value] = var_array.size();
00227 #endif
00228         }
00229     }
00230 
00231     virtual void full_propagate()
00232     {
00233         DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00234 #ifdef COUNT
00235         DynamicTrigger* count_dt = dt + var_array.size() * dom_size;
00236         for(int i = 0; i < dom_size; ++i)
00237         {
00238             int count = 0;
00239             for(int j = 0; j < var_array.size(); ++j)
00240             {
00241                 if(var_array[j].inDomain(i + dom_min))
00242                 {
00243                     count++;
00244                     var_array[j].addDynamicTrigger(count_dt + j*dom_size + i, DomainRemoval, i + dom_min);
00245                 }
00246                 counter[i] = count;
00247             }
00248         }   
00249 #endif
00250         
00251         
00252         for(int i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00253             for(int j = 0; j < dom_size; ++j)
00254             {
00255                 propagate(dt + i);
00256             }
00257     }
00258 
00259     virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00260     {
00261         D_ASSERT(v_size == var_array.size());
00262         int array_size = v_size;
00263         for(int i=0;i<array_size;i++)
00264             for( int j=i+1;j<array_size;j++)
00265             {
00266                 const vector<int>& vals = domains[v[i] - dom_min];
00267                 if(find(vals.begin(), vals.end(), v[j]) == vals.end())
00268                     return false;
00269             }                
00270         return true;
00271     }
00272 
00273     virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00274     {
00275         vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00276         vars.reserve(var_array.size());
00277         for(unsigned i = 0; i < var_array.size(); ++i)
00278             vars.push_back(var_array[i]);
00279         return vars;
00280     }
00281 
00282     virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00283         { abort(); }
00284 
00285 };
00286 
00287 template<typename VarArray>
00288 AbstractConstraint*
00289 BuildCT_CLIQUE(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray& var_array, ConstraintBlob& b)
00290 { return new CliqueConstraint<VarArray>(stateObj, var_array, b.tuples); }
00291 
00292 #endif
